titles: How to liue, and that well in all estates and times, specially when helps and comforts faile.
author: Perkins, William, 1558-1602.
publisher: Printed by Iohn Legat, printer to the Vniuersitie of Cambridge, and are to be sold at the Crowne in Pauls Churchyard by Simon Waterson,
notes: Errors in paging: p. 33 and 91 misnumbered 34 and 99.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
